Description:
Greet customers warmly and provide assistance upon entry to the store.
Engage with customers to understand their needs and preferences, offering personalized recommendations.
Assist customers in locating products, answering questions, and providing information about features and benefits.
Perform product demonstrations and provide information on promotions and discounts.
Handle cash and electronic transactions accurately and efficiently.
Maintain a neat and organized store appearance by arranging products, replenishing shelves, and ensuring proper pricing and labeling.
Collaborate with team members to achieve sales targets and deliver excellent customer service.
Upsell and cross-sell products to increase the average transaction value.
Handle customer concerns, inquiries, and returns in a professional and customer-focused manner.
Stay updated on product knowledge, industry trends, and store policies.
Assist in inventory management by conducting stock counts and replenishing merchandise.Skills
Skills:
Skills and Qualifications:
High school diploma or equivalent; additional education in retail or sales is a plus.
Proven experience in customer service or sales, preferably in a retail environment.
Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
Customer-focused mindset and a genuine passion for assisting customers.
Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced and dynamic retail setting.
Basic math skills for accurate transactions and cash handling.
Attention to detail and ability to maintain an organized and clean store environment.
Proficiency in using point-of-sale (POS) systems and other retail software.
Team player with a positive attitude and strong work ethic.
Flexibility to work evenings, weekends, and holidays as required by the retail schedule.
Ability to stand for extended periods and lift moderately heavy items when necessary.
